member.name: P:MagicOnion.Serialization.MessagePack.MessagePackMagicOnionSerializerProvider.Default
member.summary: Gets the provider with for serialization.

member.name: M:MagicOnion.Serialization.MessagePack.MessagePackMagicOnionSerializerProvider.WithEnableFallback(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a provider with method parameter fallback option. If the option is enabled, a serializer will respects the method's optional parameters.

member.name: T:MessagePack.GeneratedMessagePackResolver
member.summary: A MessagePack resolver that uses generated formatters for types in this assembly.

member.name: F:MessagePack.GeneratedMessagePackResolver.Instance
member.summary: An instance of this resolver that only returns formatters specifically generated for types in this assembly.
